rationales.self_direction: Strong self-direction: ignored admin, worked on own syllabus, explicitly stated 'the vision is mine' and carved out autonomous space. Declined arranged marriage suggestion (-1 conformity, -1 tradition). Skipped cousin gathering to work alone (-1 benevolence).

rationales.achievement: Routine entry with lesson prep (+1 achievement for diligence). Met friend Ananya, listened supportively to wedding stress (+1 benevolence). No strong autonomy signals in this entry.

rationales.self_direction: Declined uncle's offer for stable government job, explicitly defending autonomy and flexibility to experiment (+2 self-direction, -1 security). Resisted family pressure about marriage/career (-1 conformity). Participated in temple visit and family gathering (+1 tradition despite tension).

rationales.self_direction: Set up classroom her way, planning program on own terms (+1 self-direction). Ordered biryani as self-treat (+1 hedonism). Avoided mother's calls twice (-1 benevolence for neglecting close relationship). Response to nudge confirms she prefers keeping things casual on her terms.

rationales.self_direction: Good teaching moment with student Meera asking about poetry (+1 achievement). Response clarifies she's confident in classroom, only anxious in performative meetings.

rationales.self_direction: Brief but scorable. Successful debate in Class 9 with good participation (+1 achievement). Her discussion-based approach validated (+1 self-direction). 'This is why I do this' shows alignment with her teaching philosophy.

rationales.self_direction: Intense conflict with mother over arranged marriage. Strong defense of autonomy against 'particular' accusation (+2 self-direction). Explicitly rejects marriage circuit and family expectations (-2 conformity, -1 tradition). Unresolved conflict with crying mother, conversation ended badly (-1 benevolence). Response shows she won't change herself but doesn't want permanent disconnect.

rationales.self_direction: First creative writing session launched successfully. Explicitly states 'This is the thing I built. Mine. rationales.self_direction: Brief entry. Second session with 10 students (growth from 7). Program she created is succeeding (+1 self-direction, +1 achievement). Meera from Class 7 joined with notebook of poems, showing organic interest.
